li.label: roomie
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has no care in the world for there room. they could care less if a room is cramped dirty or shared or uncomfortable, aslong as they have a place to sleep they are ok. they still get negative moodlets from hot or cold rooms.

li.label: tough
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones. {PAWN_pronoun} takes much less damage than other people from the same blows. {PAWN_pronoun} is extremely hard to kill.

li.label: Rot Obsession
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a very strange attraction to rotting corpses, what normally disgust people about a rotting corpses smell is a guilty pleasure for {PAWN_nameDef}.

li.label: Imperturbable
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has never had insults get to them before, {PAWN_nameDef} can easily brush off a insult and not let it get to them

li.label: Mortar Soldier
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a trained Mortar soldier a few years back. [PAWN_pronoun] he was the best in the platoon when it came to using Mortars being able to hit most targets.

li.label: Unsightly
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a extreme liking to unsightly environments. they relish the sight of hideous things but hates anything thats brings beauty to a place.

li.label: Passionate
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has always had a extreme burning passion for there work. they have much stronger moodlets when doing a skill they love.

li.label: Rawism
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has always been eating rawfood ever since they was little. they dont get negative moodlets from eating raw or nasty food or eating without a table.

li.label: SicklyEnjoyer
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is in love with getting sick. {PAWN_pronoun} loves the idea of getting sick and doing anything in their power to do it.

li.label: Picky Eater
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has always been a picky eater and despises eating anything below fine meal.

li.label: lovesick
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is very passionate about having a partner. {PAWN_pronoun} will never get debuffs from being rejected or rejecting others etc but will have stronger moodlets in a relationship and stronger debuffs if there heart is betrayed.

li.label: brawler
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} likes to fight up close and personal. {PAWN_possessive} accuracy is greatly increased in melee combat, but {PAWN_pronoun}'ll be very unhappy if asked to carry a ranged weapon.

li.label: night owl
li.description:
{PAWN_nameDef} likes to be up during the night, and sleep during the day.

{PAWN_pronoun} gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h) and mood loss if awake during the day (11h-18h).

{PAWN_pronoun} doesn't get a mood penalty for being in the dark.

li.label: Early Bird
li.description:
{PAWN_nameDef} enjoys to be up during the day, and sleep during the night.

{PAWN_pronoun} gets a mood bonus if awake at day (23h-6h) and mood loss if awake during the night (11h-18h).

{PAWN_pronoun} doesn't get a mood penalty for being in the light.

li.label: greedy
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} needs a really impressive bedroom. {PAWN_pronoun} gets a mood loss if {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't get what {PAWN_pronoun} wants.

li.label: jealous
li.description: For {PAWN_nameDef}, it's degrading to have a less impressive bedroom than someone else. {PAWN_pronoun} gets a mood loss if any colonist has a more impressive bedroom.

li.label: ascetic
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has forsaken physical comforts and enjoyments in favor of a simple, pure lifestyle. {PAWN_pronoun} will become unhappy if if {PAWN_pronoun} has a bedroom that's too impressive. {PAWN_pronoun} also dislikes fancy food and prefers to eat raw. {PAWN_pronoun} never judges others by their appearance.

li.label: annoying voice
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef}'s voice has a particularly grating, nasal quality to it, and {PAWN_pronoun} tends to talk in barked, garbled phrases. This predisposes others to dislike {PAWN_objective}.

li.label: soothing voice
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef}'s voice has a particularly magical, harmony quality to it, and {PAWN_pronoun} tends to talk in sweet, careful phrases. This predisposes others to like {PAWN_objective}.

li.label: pyromaniac
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} loves fire. {PAWN_pronoun} will never extinguish fires. To relieve stress, {PAWN_pronoun} will occasionally go on random fire starting sprees. This happens more often if {PAWN_possessive} mood is low.

li.label: Insane
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} loves to murder people. {PAWN_pronoun} is very dangerous to the colony, {PAWN_pronoun} will occasionally go on random Murder spree. This happens more often if {PAWN_possessive} mood is low.

li.label: Unhinged
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has one too many screws loose in their head. {PAWN_pronoun} will occasionally throw a tantrum. This happens more often if {PAWN_possessive} mood is low.

li.label: Nature Lover
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has always enjoyed being outdoors. {PAWN_pronoun} will never get negative thoughts about being outside.

li.label: Witcher
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has always dabbled around with plants and human corpses and butchering them. [PAWN_pronoun] is great at planting and butchering.

li.label: Nyctophobic
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has always been Terrified of the dark and as a result they move faster and have a weakened mind and a higher dark penalty.

li.label: Merciless
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has Powerful penetrating Attacks, and attacks more often. {PAWN_pronoun} does much more damage than other people. {PAWN_pronoun} is very dangerous in a fight.

li.label: quick sleeper
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} doesn't need as much sleep as the average person. Whether {PAWN_pronoun}'s sleeping on a bed or on the ground, {PAWN_pronoun} will be fully rested in about two thirds the usual time.

li.label: Insomnia
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} suffers from Insomnia and find it hard to get to sleep. Whether {PAWN_pronoun}'s sleeping on a bed or on the ground, {PAWN_pronoun} will be fully rested in about two thirds longer then the usual time.
